statements: SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM identity_theft_data WHERE birth_date < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data WHERE social_security_number = '123456789';
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM identity_theft_data WHERE address LIKE '%California%';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM identity_theft_data ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, address FROM identity_theft_data WHERE social_security_number = '123-45-6789'
SELECT full_name, credit_card_number FROM identity_theft_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM identity_theft_data ORDER BY birth_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM identity_theft_data GROUP BY credit_card_number ORDER BY total_users DESC
SELECT user_id, full_name, birth_date FROM identity_theft_data WHERE full_name LIKE '%Doe%' AND birth_date > '1990-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, address FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM investigation_records WHERE date_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT full_name, email, outcome FROM users JOIN investigation_records ON users.user_id = investigation_records.user_id ORDER BY outcome ASC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' OR address LIKE '%Avenue%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, address FROM users INNER JOIN investigation_records ON users.user_id = investigation_records.user_id ORDER BY date_time DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, description FROM users LEFT JOIN investigation_records ON users.user_id = investigation_records.user_id WHERE outcome='Closed' ORDER BY user_id ASC, date_time DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, social_security_number FROM users WHERE social_security_number IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(social_security_number) = 9 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement ORDER BY agency_name DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%user%';
SELECT agency_name, contact_phone FROM law_enforcement WHERE agency_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, password FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM identities ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM reports WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, report_date FROM users JOIN reports ON users.user_id = reports.user_id;
SELECT full_name, dob FROM identities WHERE dob < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investigations ORDER BY investigation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM law_enforcement_agencies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, theft_description FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE case_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM stolen_credentials WHERE account_type = 'Email';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, members FROM investigation_team WHERE team_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM law_enforcement_agencies ORDER BY agency_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT agency_name, location FROM law_enforcement_agencies WHERE location = 'New York' AND agency_name LIKE 'F%';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM investigation_team WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT victim_name, perpetrator_name, LEFT(theft_description, 50) AS shortened_description FROM identity_theft_cases WHERE LENGTH(theft_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM stolen_credentials WHERE account_type = 'Banking' ORDER BY credential_id DESC;
